message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this unique product for $1200000. It's a significant discount from its true value, and I believe it's an excellent deal for you. Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a limited budget. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While $900000 is a good offer, I'm still hoping to recoup a bit more of the value. I'm willing to come down to $1000000, which is a fair compromise.  Let me know if this works for you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1000000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $850000. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at this price.
